Description: Hilo Weekend Bag is Rains’ take on the essential overnight bag – one of three available sizes.    Hilo Weekend Bag is a clean and contemporary travel-favorite, balancing Rains’ waterproof fabric with signature straps and hardware details.   Open the coated full-length zip to find a spacious single main compartment – with plenty of room for clothing, tech and more for a work trip or a weekend getaway. Once packed, secure belongings via the silhouette’s side-mounted compression straps.    The design is finished with webbing carry handles, with comfort sleeve, and attachment rings for an included detachable shoulder strap.    Hilo Weekend Bag is cut from Rains’ signature waterproof PU fabric, engineered for carrying strength, durability, and a smooth feel.
feature:
Waterproof signature PU fabric
Coated zip closure
Single main compartment
Side compression straps
Detachable adjustable webbing shoulder strap
Webbing carry straps with handle wrap

Description: MSN Bag reinterprets the classic school backpack for city-ready wardrobes. Characterized by a minimalistic silhouette and flap with carabiner closure.   This bag features an internal laptop pocket, a spacious main compartment and finished off with snap compressions at opening and sides.    The laptop pocket fits a 15" laptop with sleeve, making the MSN Bag a perfect computer-ready staple for everyday commutes.    MSN Bag is cut from Rains' signature PU fabric, engineered for carrying strength, durability and a smooth feel.

Description: Texel Duffel Bag is a waterproof, high-function travel bag designed for traveling in any weather.    The Texel Duffel Bag is characterized by its tubular shape, large zip-opening for easy packing and wrap-around webbing straps.    Unzipping the main U-shaped flap reveals a large main compartment with a side mesh pocket. The flap’s underside is also equipped with two zipped mesh pockets.    Texel Duffel Bag features a concealed side pocket for passports, keys and other small essentials, a reinforced base for durability and stability, and side-mounted compression straps, helping to keep contents in place.    The Duffel can be carried in various ways via durable handle straps and adjustable padded backstraps -- both by foot and bike.   Texel Duffel Bag is cut in Rains’ signature waterproof PU fabric, engineered for carrying strength, durability, and a smooth feel.
feature:
Waterproof signature PU fabric
Ushaped flap with zip closure
Single main compartment
Side zip pocket
Internal mesh pocket
Two underflap zipped mesh pockets
Reinforced base panel
Sidemounted compression straps
Adjustable padded backstraps
Padded carry handles

Description: Rolltop Rucksack Large is a dependable city staple. The design interprets Rains' most iconic Rolltop Rucksack with larger proportions and additional functionality.   Rolltop Rucksack Large is carefully designed to keep precipitation out when traveling from point A to Z. To protect essentials from rain, fold the rolltop into a tight scroll and secure using the signature carabiner.    Open the rucksack to reveal a single main compartment. Exterior features include a side-access laptop pocket, front pocket with coated zipper and two side slip pockets.    Cycle-ready features include a front D-ring -- ideal for holding bike locks -- and a buckle-fastened chest strap for a secure ride-proof fit.   Rolltop Rucksack Large is cut from Rains' signature waterproof PU fabric, engineered for carrying strength, durability and a smooth feel.
feature:
Waterproof signature PU fabric
Rolltop opening with snap compression and carabiner closure
Single main compartment
Front pocket with coated zip
Sideaccess slip pocket fits 16" laptop
Two side slip pockets
Padded airmesh back panel
Adjustable compression shoulder straps
Webbing carry handle 
Adjustable chest strap

Description: Texel Tech Bag is a functional waterproof laptop bag designed for short trips and commutes.    Unzip Texel Tech Bag to reveal a main compartment with a padded sleeve for 15” laptop, plus zip and mesh pockets for easy organization. Between those pockets and the main compartment sits a large zip pocket for small tablets and notebooks.   On the outside this waterproof tech bag features various zips and prominent front utility pockets, ideal for passports, chargers, and other small items. The design is finished with webbing carry handles and a detachable shoulder strap.    A back-mounted trolley sleeve, with zip pocket, allows the bag to be slid onto telescopic trolley handles for easy transportation.*    Texel Tech Bag is cut from Rains’ signature waterproof PU fabric, engineered for carrying strength, durability, and a smooth feel.   *Sized to fit Texel Cabin Trolley and Texel Cabin Bag. May not fit trolley bags from other manufacturers.
feature:
Waterproof signature PU fabric
Zip closure
Divided main compartment
Padded sleeve fits 15" laptop
Internal mesh pockets, zip pocket

Webbing carry straps with handle wrap

Description: Puffed Backpack Micro features a heavily puffed exterior with carabiner closure. It’s cut from waterproof PU fabric, designed to repel rain.    This clean and elevated micro backpack is characterized by its heavily puffed look, slick stitch details, squared shape and flap with central strap and carabiner closure. The size is minimal, yet just big enough to fit all necessities and even fits a 11” laptop in the inner pocket.   Puffed Backpack Micro is cut from Rains’ signature waterproof PU fabric, engineered for carrying strength, durability and a smooth feel.

Description: Sibu Weekend Bag is a light and compact travel-favorite. It’s cut from durable nylon-ripstop and coated for all-weather protection.   Sibu Weekend Bag is designed with intention, keeping its weight low and practicality high. This weekend bag is characterized by a compact, yet spacious main compartment with a smaller mesh pocket for loose essentials. In need of more space -- just unclip the carabiners on the side to expand the volume of the bag.   Externally, the design is fitted with sturdy webbing storage loops, a key loop with snap hook and a zipped pocket at the front. Sibu Weekend Bag can be carried in the removable crossbody strap or in the carry handles.    Sibu Weekend Bag is cut from technical nylon-ripstop fabric finished with a water-repellent TPU coating. The design is sleek and lightweight with great durability.

Coated zip closure

Description: Texel Moulded Backpack is a sturdy travel-companion. Design is proportioned to house full-size tech safely behind a moulded front.    Texel Moulded Backpack is a waterproof utility bag that taps into the demands of daily commutes and traveling. The silhouette is characterized by a folded top with extra wide opening and a moulded front pocket.   This high-performing backpack can accommodate two laptops at once -- one in the hard front pocket with soft lining and one in the internal compartment, both fit 16" laptops. Features also include multiple pockets inside, a concealed zip pocket on the backside and drink storage on the sides.   Texel Moulded Backpack features a trolley slip pocket making it slide seamlessly over telescopic trolley handles for easy transportation. Compression straps keep contents firmly in place.    Texel Moulded Backpack is cut from Rains’ signature waterproof PU fabric, engineered for carrying strength, durability, and a smooth feel. Design is lined in our core grey colour to make finding and organizing easier even in dim light.
feature:
Waterproof signature PU fabric
Folded top with zip for extra wide opening
Signature front webbing closure
Hard front compartment with microfiber lining, fits 16” laptop
Internal laptop pocket, fits 16” laptop
Concealed zip pocket on backside with key hanger

Description: Texel Crossbody Bag is a waterproof bag designed with multiple zip pockets for daily essentials.    Texel Crossbody Bag has a utility feel, underlined by its strap details and external side pocket, perfect for small items like phones and keys. The main compartment holds zip and mesh pockets for easy organization.    The waterproof bag is finished with a webbing adjustable shoulder strap and base-mounted storage straps, ideal for holding a light jacket, umbrella or water bottle.    Texel Crossbody Bag is carefully designed for traveling, even if that's just a daily commute. A back-mounted trolley sleeve, with zip pocket, allows the bag to be slid onto telescopic trolley handles for easy transportation.*    The design is cut from Rains’ signature waterproof PU fabric, engineered for carrying strength, durability, and a smooth feel.   *Sized to fit Texel Cabin Trolley and Texel Cabin Bag. May not fit trolley bags from other manufacturers.
feature:
Waterproof signature PU fabric
Zip closure
Divided main compartment
Internal mesh pocket and zip pocket 
Side zip pocket
Adjustable webbing shoulder strap
Basemounted storage straps
Trolley sleeve with zip pocket

Description: Trail Rolltop Backpack is a sporty city staple, perfect for commutes on bike or foot.    Trail Rolltop Backpack is characterized by a convenient rolltop opening. To protect essentials from rain, fold the rolltop into a tight scroll and secure using the snap compressions.   This design leans into the sports-utility mood of the Trail family. It is detailed with an internal padded pocket and a front zip pocket for easy access. Finished off with a buckle-fastened chest strap for a secure ride-proof fit.   Trail Rolltop Backpack is cut from Rains' signature PU fabric, engineered for carrying strength, durability and a smooth feel.

Description: Backpack Mini is a downscaled version of Backpack. Silhouette is characterized by its squared shape and flap with magnet snap fastenings.   This clean and ever contemporary rucksack features an internal laptop pocket, a spacious main compartment and a concealed external phone pocket on the back panel.    The laptop pocket fits a 13" laptop with sleeve, making the squared backpack a perfect computer-ready staple for commuting on bike or by foot.    Backpack Mini is cut from Rains' signature PU fabric, engineered for carrying strength, durability and a smooth feel.

Description: Rolltop Rucksack is a dependable city staple that's perfect for commutes on bike or foot. Characterized by a rolltop opening and cycle-ready features.   Rolltop Rucksack is carefully designed to keep precipitation out when traveling from point A to Z. To protect essentials from rain, fold the rolltop into a tight scroll and secure using the signature carabiner.    Open the rucksack to reveal a single main compartment. Exterior features include a side-access laptop pocket and a front pocket with coated zipper.    Cycle-ready features include a front D-ring -- ideal for holding bike locks -- and a buckle-fastened chest strap for a secure ride-proof fit.   Rolltop Rucksack is cut from Rains' signature PU fabric, engineered for carrying strength, durability and a smooth feel.
feature:
Waterproof signature PU fabric 
Rolltop opening with snap compression and carabiner closure
Single main compartment
Front pocket with coated zip
Sideaccess slip pocket fits 16" laptop
Padded airmesh back panel
Adjustable padded shoulder straps
Webbing carry handle
Adjustable chest strap
